title: arent getting ip/blue essence
body: ive been stuck at 751 blue essence for about 3 games whats the deal can someone fix this issue has anyone else had this issue?

replies.body: After the preseason change, IP was merged with BE but the main ways of earning BE hasn't changed. You don't get any after matches, but you get extra capsules on level-ups now which contain BE or champ shards that can be disenchanted for BE.
but im below lvl 30 shouldnt i be getting some after every game
after every time you level up, you will get a capsule
